statements: SELECT * FROM HedgeFundAnalysis;
SELECT fund_id, fund_name FROM HedgeFundAnalysis WHERE fund_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM HedgeFundAnalysis WHERE market_trend = 'Bullish';
SELECT fund_id, fund_name, market_trend FROM HedgeFundAnalysis ORDER BY fund_id DESC;
SELECT fund_name, trading_opportunities FROM HedgeFundAnalysis WHERE market_trend = 'Bearish';
SELECT * FROM HedgeFundAnalysis WHERE fund_id = 1
SELECT fund_name, trading_opportunities FROM HedgeFundAnalysis WHERE market_trend='Bullish'
SELECT fund_name, trading_opportunities FROM HedgeFundAnalysis WHERE market_trend='Bearish' ORDER BY fund_id DESC
SELECT fund_name, market_trend FROM HedgeFundAnalysis WHERE trading_opportunities LIKE '%options%'
SELECT * FROM HedgeFundAnalysis WHERE fund_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM hedge_fund_positions
SELECT fund_id, stock_symbol, position_size FROM hedge_fund_positions WHERE fund_id = 123
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_prices ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT fund_id, SUM(position_size) AS total_position_size FROM hedge_fund_positions GROUP BY fund_id HAVING total_position_size > 10000
SELECT * FROM hedge_fund_positions JOIN stock_prices ON hedge_fund_positions.stock_symbol = stock_prices.stock_symbol
SELECT * FROM hedge_fund_positions WHERE fund_id = 1 ORDER BY position_id DESC;
SELECT position_id, stock_symbol, position_size FROM hedge_fund_positions WHERE fund_id = 2 AND position_size > 1000;
SELECT stock_symbol, price, market_cap FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY market_cap DESC;
SELECT fund_id, SUM(position_size) AS total_position_size FROM hedge_fund_positions GROUP BY fund_id HAVING SUM(position_size) > 5000;
SELECT hf.position_id, hf.fund_id, hf.stock_symbol, sp.price FROM hedge_fund_positions hf JOIN stock_prices sp ON hf.stock_symbol = sp.stock_symbol WHERE sp.price < 100 ORDER BY fund_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM HedgeFundInvestments;
SELECT HedgeFundName, InvestmentAmount FROM HedgeFundInvestments ORDER BY InvestmentAmount DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE TrendStartDate > '2022-01-01';
SELECT TrendName, TrendStartDate, TrendEndDate FROM MarketTrends WHERE TrendEndDate < '2023-01-01';
SELECT OpportunityDescription, OpportunityValue, OpportunityStatus FROM TradingOpportunities WHERE OpportunityStatus = 'Active';
SELECT InvestmentAmount, HedgeFundName FROM HedgeFundInvestments WHERE InvestmentAmount > 10000 ORDER BY InvestmentAmount DESC;
SELECT TrendName, TrendDescription, TrendStartDate FROM MarketTrends WHERE TrendStartDate BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY TrendStartDate ASC;
SELECT OpportunityValue, OpportunityDescription, OpportunityStatus FROM TradingOpportunities WHERE OpportunityStatus = 'Open' ORDER BY OpportunityValue DESC, OpportunityDate ASC;
SELECT * FROM HedgeFundInvestments ORDER BY InvestmentDate DESC;
SELECT TrendName, TrendStartDate, TrendEndDate, TrendDescription FROM MarketTrends WHERE TrendEndDate < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM hedge_funds;
SELECT fund_name, fund_manager FROM hedge_funds;
SELECT fund_strategy, fund_name, fund_manager FROM hedge_funds ORDER BY fund_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT opportunity_name, opportunity_profit FROM trading_opportunities WHERE opportunity_duration > 30;
SELECT * FROM hedge_funds
SELECT fund_id, fund_name, fund_manager FROM hedge_funds
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT opportunity_name, opportunity_profit FROM trading_opportunities WHERE opportunity_profit > 5000
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, trade_date FROM trade_history ORDER BY trade_date DESC
SELECT * FROM HedgeFundInvestors;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM HedgeFundInvestors WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM HedgeFundInvestors ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount, investment_date FROM HedgeFundInvestors WHERE investment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM HedgeFundTrades WHERE trade_date <= '2022-04-15';
SELECT * FROM HedgeFundInvestors ORDER BY investor_name DESC;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM HedgeFundInvestors WHERE investment_amount > 100000;
SELECT investor_id, investor_name, investment_date FROM HedgeFundInvestors WHERE investor_name LIKE 'J%';

SELECT hfi.investor_name, hft.stock_symbol, sp.price FROM HedgeFundInvestors hfi JOIN HedgeFundTrades hft ON hfi.investor_id = hft.investor_id JOIN StockPrices sp ON hft.stock_symbol = sp.stock_symbol;

SELECT hfi.investor_name, mt.trend_description, mt.trend_date FROM HedgeFundInvestors hfi JOIN MarketTrends mt ON hfi.investor_id = mt.trend_id WHERE mt.trend_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
